definition: line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: Spanish unemployment soared, and the budget went into deep deficit.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙失业率飞速上升，预算陷入深深的赤字之中。

sentences.english: Wall Street gains after a smaller-than-expected number of jobs lost and a surprise drop in the unemployment rate.
sentences.chinese: 小于预期的失业数和失业率的神奇下跌使美股上涨。

sentences.english: But long-term high unemployment will reduce the quality of the workforce.
sentences.chinese: 但长时间的高失业率会降低工人的劳动素质。

sentences.english: The latest unemployment figures for Iraq are between 23% and 38%.
sentences.chinese: 伊拉克最新的失业率在23%到38%之间。

sentences.english: This relatively low level is also the result of demographic developments.
sentences.chinese: 这个相对较低的青年失业率也是人口发展的结果。

sentences.english: If this trend continues, then the unemployment rate should begin declining.
sentences.chinese: 如果按此趋势继续发展，失业率就应该即将下降。

sentences.english: In states where unemployment didn't climb as much, claims dropped.
sentences.chinese: 在失业率升幅较小的州，男性的投诉率反而下降。

sentences.english: Another spike in unemployment could well set it loose.
sentences.chinese: 失业率的再次攀升可能会让保护主义成为脱缰之马。

sentences.english: The police imputes the rise in crime to high unemployment.
sentences.chinese: 警方把犯罪增加的原因归咎于失业率太高。

sentences.english: True enough, this is an era of record-breaking lows in unemployment.
sentences.chinese: 的确，现在的失业率比以往任何时候都低。

sentences.english: The unemployment rate in his area, Martin County, now exceeds 11 percent.
sentences.chinese: 他们马丁县的失业率现在已经超过11%。

sentences.english: The country's 21% unemployment rate is the highest in the EU.
sentences.chinese: 这个国家21%的失业率在欧盟高据榜首。

sentences.english: Unemployment is near record highs for people aged 45 and older, just as they hit peak wage-earning years.
sentences.chinese: 对于45岁以上的人而言，失业率接近记录高点。

sentences.english: The factories close, unemployment soars and tax collections collapse.
sentences.chinese: 工厂纷纷关闭，失业率大幅上升，税收急剧下降。

sentences.english: The ILO also says the United States is reporting slightly higher rates of unemployment than Europe.
sentences.chinese: 国际劳工组织同时称美国报告的失业率比欧洲的稍高。

sentences.english: But shoppers have been made hesitant by high unemployment and falling home prices.
sentences.chinese: 然而高企的失业率和下跌的房价却令购物者踌躇再三。

definition: measures of national income and output
